website_summaries.verdict: This Merrell shoe for speed hikers manages to capture the attention of the outdoor community, thanks to its breathability and comfort. Those who have used it also laud its lightness and quick-drying properties.However,  its susceptibility to abrasion might come off as a letdown for male and female adventurers. All in all, alleged durability issues aside, the Merrell All Out Blaze Aero Sport remains an interesting option, both for water and speed hiking, thanks to its set of positive qualities.
pros: Droves of users are in awe because of how breathable the Merrell All Out Blaze Aero Sport is
According to a majority of adventurers, it is indeed a gratifyingly comfortable hiking shoe
A handful of buyers state that this Merrell product dries quickly after being exposed to water
This shoe’s lightweight construction is a boon on the trail, based on a bunch of All Out Blaze Aero Sport’ reviews
Several customers love the arch support of this speed hiker
A minority of shoppers commend the outsole’s grip on slippery terrain
cons: According to some outdoor enthusiasts, its mesh upper is susceptible to scuffs and abrasive elements
A couple of wearers says that sand and debris can get inside the Merrell All Out Blaze Aero Sport easily
A few purchasers are not happy with the shoe’s non-removable footbed

customer_reviews.title: Three weeks in Europe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to get me through a vacation in France and Portugal, knowing I needed close-toed shoes especially in Lisbon and Porto for the hilly, cobblestoned streets. I love these shoes! They are cute, comfortable and held up perfectly - and we walked easily 8-10 miles a day.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: European Vacation Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I've come to trust this brand in the shoe did not let me down. I purchased it for a trip to Europe knowing I would need incredibly comfortable shoes but I didn't want to look like a tourist in clunky athletic shoes. I wore them with a very thin short sock and put many many miles of both walking and bicycling on the shoes and they never let me down. Comfortable with enough arch support. I am a true nine-and-a-half I never wear any other size and this 9 and 1/2 fit me perfectly. I wore them with leggings or with shorts and I've always felt like I looked stylish.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Not supportive
customer_reviews.text: This shoes were not nearly as supportive as other merrell shoes I own. They felt narrow and a little snug. There was very little arch support. Probably the worst quality is how flat the sole is though, it doesn't allow for any natural rock in your step. I don't think these would be comfortable to walk in. I'm returning theses, it's dissapointing because the style is nice. I was hoping for a "dressy" pair of supportive sneakers to wear to work with khakis.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and True to Size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes hoping they would alleviate the pain from a Morton's neuroma while trail walking, and they didn't disappoint. They are roomy through the toes, soft and pliable, and supportive, as well.
customer_reviews.author: sailgal

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding shoes that work for me. This brand seems to work well. These shoes are very comfortable and they are very stretchy throughout so they move with your feet. I am very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Very cute styling but a bit tight on my fussy feet
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for shoes that could be casual but also dress up a pair of shorts or jeans. The shoes are very cute style wise but after wearing them for a few hours around my house I felt pressure points on the bottom of my feet and on a bunion. I sadly packed them up and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: fitzcan

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and lightweight, but runs large and the shoelaces were ridiculously long, I was stepping on them even when tied with a large bow. It was weird
customer_reviews.author: Littlebug

customer_reviews.title: Love this show and the look
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hard foot to fit and Merrells are my go to. These shoes are extremely comfortable and took no time to wear in. I love the look they are perfect for my job which requires a lot of car time along with walking as needed
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but slipped off my heal
customer_reviews.text: As always, Merrell makes a very comfortable and well made shoe. Unfortunately, they put a piece of elastic fabric at the back of the shoe near the heal/ankle and so it felt like the shoe was "slipping". I ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Diya Heal

customer_reviews.title: A little too stiff
customer_reviews.text: A little too stiff for my liking. I was hoping for a good lifestyle casual shoe, that I could even wear with a skirt. This were just a little too stiff for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: it has a fantastic sneaker look. Fashionable one, that is
customer_reviews.text: It looks very fashionable at a time when you want to look outstanding but in a "sneaker" gathering. buy it.
customer_reviews.author: may

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shoe!!! Pure class!! Fits perfect, SO comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GoldenGirl50

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. My only complaint is the heel slips, like it’s cut to wide. Otherwise it’s a great show.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surdy Build, Great Look
customer_reviews.text: Excellent material and sturdy build. The shoe fits and the size allows for external arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I am a god walker. These shoes are comfortable for walking long distances. I can slide them on an off easily
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Fashion meets Comfort - stylish shoe with support!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fashionable and oh so comfortable!! They are perfect with yoga pants and with jeans. I wore them straight out of the box on my flight and then most of the weekend walking in San Francisco. I have a history of plantar fasciitis and these shoes provided the arch support I needed!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product but in my opinion was too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: CSY

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and comfort of these - already had them in black, just got a new pair in taupe. They have great arch support and nice, resilient soles. Like that they're made of recycled fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Great look, super comfortable, good support. I purchased a second pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper65

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The brindle color does not look like advertised color. Looks more like a light olive green to me. I am not color blind.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Bilberry

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: But they run narrow. I was so disappointed that they were too narrow and I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Suzio

customer_reviews.title: Order straight from Merrell
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit, size is exactly what I wear. The color I ordered was Brindle. These shoes are definitely the Lichen color. Def green! Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not correct sizing
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes but did not fit my foot correctly. Make sure to get more than one size to try on. Great quality and love the look!
customer_reviews.author: brandi zak

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the most comfortable shoes I have well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Marina Downing

customer_reviews.title: VERY  NICE  .
customer_reviews.text: THEY LIGHT AND FIRM TO HOLD YOUR FEET IN PLACE AND VERY GOOD LOOKING . EVERY ONE TODAY IS EXPERIENCINFG FOOT PAIN . . THIS ARE VERY SOFR AND FIRM ENOUGH COMBINATION THAT IS HARD TO FIND OTHER SNEAKERS ARE SOFT OR VERY FIRM HARD ON YOUR FEET . MERRELL IS THE ONLY BRAND THAT CAN ACHIEVE THIS COMBINATION ( SOFT AND FIRM ) WHICH IS WHAT OUR FEET NEED .AND IF YOU EVER WANTED A YELOW CLASIC SNEAKER BEAUTIFUL SOFT EASE TO WEAR WITH EVERY THING THIS IS IT ..
customer_reviews.author: JACKIE

customer_reviews.title: Not so great, but cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes but really made by a company named Vibram in Cambodia. (Written on bottom of shoe) these feel like a Merrill knock-off. Minimal are support. I have other Merrill’s that are so much more comfortable. I will most likely return
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe but....
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice looking shoe but it runs large and didn’t fit like the Merrels I’m used to. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I would receommend ordering a half size down. They were on the long side.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Demetri

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's All Out Blaze Aero Sport Hiking Shoe
product_meta.description: This speed hiker attacks terrain. Its ventilated mesh upper is made for hot temps and forging creeks. Efficiency comes from the unifly midsole. In general we recommend the following guidelines for cleaning the footwear:Cleaning: on a regular basis, brush away any surface dirt with a soft brush. After extended, rugged use, wash with mild soap and warm water. Be sure to rinse all soap off as it is hydrophilic. Drying: open footwear fully, remove the insole and laces and dry at room temperature. Never expose to heat! Conditioning: recommended treatment depends on construction and materials of the footwear (most treatments do alter color and appearance).
feature_bullets: Vibram EcoDura outsole made with 30% recycled post manufacture waste
